data.eml:eml: Pushing the limits - two new species of Pteromalus (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea, Pteromalidae) from Central Europe with remarkable morphology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baur, Hannes (2015): Pushing the limits - two new species of Pteromalus (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea, Pteromalidae) from Central Europe with remarkable morphology. ZooKeys 514: 43-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.514.9910, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.514.9910
